name: Jianyuan Coal Mine
company_mentions: 鄂托克旗建元煤焦化有限责任公司 (Ordos Jianyuan Coal Coking Co., Ltd.)

web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by a local company and owned by Hongxing International Development Company.
